sentences.english: Cells in different parts of the endosperm vary somewhat in composition.
sentences.chinese: 細胞在胚乳的不同部分其組成有所不同。

sentences.english: Seeds with abundant endosperm and small embryo.
sentences.chinese: 種子有豐富的胚乳和小的胚。

sentences.english: It offers the theoretical foundation for the use of this endosperm specific promoter.
sentences.chinese: 爲這一胚乳特異啓動子的廣泛利用提供了理論依據。

sentences.english: Aleurone layer was the cell layer by which the endosperm assimilated nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 糊粉層是胚乳吸收養分的細胞層。

sentences.english: Endosperm formation is nuclear type and the endosperm forms chalazal haustorium.
sentences.chinese: 核型胚乳，合點端具胚乳吸器。

sentences.english: Endosperm formation is nuclear type and the endosperm forms chalazal haustorium.
sentences.chinese: 核型胚乳，合點端具胚乳吸器。

sentences.english: It showed that micro- endosperm super high oil corn notable characterized by large embryo.
sentences.chinese: 可見，微胚乳超高油玉米以大胚爲顯著特點。

sentences.english: There is also a certain interrelation of development be- tween the fruit, the embryo and the endosperm.
sentences.chinese: 胚和胚乳的發育與果實的生長有一定的相關性。

sentences.english: Milling fractures many of the cells of the endosperm, exposing their contents.
sentences.chinese: 碾磨使大量胚乳細胞破裂，暴露了它的內含物。

sentences.english: Sweet corn is an endosperm mutant which was controled by single recessive gene or multi-recessive genes.
sentences.chinese: 甜玉米受一個或多個隱性基因控制的胚乳突變體。

sentences.english: The endosperm also contains a numbers of nitrogenous compounds.
sentences.chinese: 胚乳中還包含許多含氮化合物。

sentences.english: The cellulization of endosperm in Gramineae was summarized and compared.
sentences.chinese: 文章還對禾本科植物胚乳的細胞化作了比較和總結。

sentences.english: In peas there is an initial deposition of materials in the endosperm following anthesis.
sentences.chinese: 豌豆中緊隨開花期之後胚乳開始有物質積累。

sentences.english: Both gums are the ground endosperm of seeds.
sentences.chinese: 兩種膠都是種子磨細的胚乳。

sentences.english: The endosperm develops into nuclear type after fecundation.
sentences.chinese: 雙受精後，胚乳發育爲核型。

definition: dicotyledon (plant family distinguished by two embryonic leaves, includes daisies, broadleaved trees, herbaceous plants)
